inclusion.criterion: severe stenosis of intracranial ICA or MCA
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: impaired CVR within previous three months but not before 3 weeks after acute stroke
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Within 2 weeks of cardiac catheterization or arterial puncture at femoral puncture site
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Decompensated heart failure , usually class 3 or 4
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Persistent and uncontrolled hypertension (BP persistently >160/100 mmHg)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA without residual deficits, HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD. He reports occasional dizziness and HA, denies CP/SOB. Carotid U/S showed significant bilateral carotid stenosis, L>R. Angiography revealed an 80% stenosis of the R ICA and a 90% L ICA stenosis.
